title: BRIEF-Ruralco Shareholders Approves Proposed Acquisition Of Ruralco By Agrium Australia
text:
BRIEF-Ruralco Shareholders Approves Proposed Acquisition Of Ruralco By Agrium Australia

Stock Markets 6 hours ago (Sep 06, 2019 15:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Ruralco Shareholders Approves Proposed Acquisition Of Ruralco By Agrium Australia Sept 6 (Reuters) - Ruralco Holdings Ltd : * APPROVED SCHEME OF ARRANGEMENT UNDER WHICH AGRIUM AUSTRALIA WILL ACQUIRE 100% OF ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF RURALCO * SCHEME IS EXPECTED TO BE IMPLEMENTED ON MONDAY, 30 SEPTEMBER 2019 * RURALCO BOARD HAS DECLARED A FULLY FRANKED SPECIAL DIVIDEND OF $0.84 PER SHARE SUBJECT TO SCHEME BECOMING EFFECTIVE

BRIEF-Ruralco Shareholders Approves Proposed Acquisition Of Ruralco By Agrium Australia
description: BRIEF-Ruralco Shareholders Approves Proposed Acquisition Of Ruralco By Agrium Australia
